author: Associated Press
title: U.S. consumer confidence sinks as virus begins having impact
description: Economists say confidence is sure to fall further as the virus’ impact takes a bigger toll on the economy.
content:
Analysts said the sharp drop in the confidence index reflects rising concerns about the damage the virus will cause and about the sharp declines in stock markets.
The intensification of Covid-19 and extreme volatility in the financial markets have increased … [+466 chars]
